messages.content: What is the purpose of the comfyui-caching-embeddings repository?
The purpose of the comfyui-caching-embeddings repository is to cache the CLIP embeddings and subtly accelerate the inference process by bypassing unnecessary computations.
Where should the comfyui-caching-embeddings repository be cloned?
The comfyui-caching-embeddings repository should be cloned to the `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` directory.
How can you install the comfyui-caching-embeddings repository?

You can install the comfyui-caching-embeddings repository by running the following command: `git clone https://github.com/discus0434/comfyui-caching-embeddings.git ComfyUI/custom_nodes/comfyui-caching-embeddings`
How can you use the comfyui-caching-embeddings node?
You can use the comfyui-caching-embeddings node just like the `CLIPTextEncode` node.
